message: This proposal aims for a fair division considering the decreasing value of money over rounds. I propose we split it 3:2.
I'm looking for a higher share, but willing to compromise. This is my opening offer.
I believe in an equal division given the diminishing value of money. My proposal offers a 50/50 split.
